creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Residents of Chasiv Yar, Donetsk region, waiting in the evacuation bus of the Vostok SOS organization. As Russian troops advancing in Bakhmut area, this city becomes dangerous to stay in, as frequent rusisan shelling can ruin civillian houses, wound or even kill them anytime. Vostok SOS is a humanitarian organization evacuating civillians from the dangerous areas of Donbas to safety.
